targetingStatus.description: Current targeting status for the interest category (e.g., active, inactive)

impressions.description: Number of times marketer's content was displayed

clicks.description: Number of clicks on the marketer's content

totalConversions.description: Total number of conversions across all actions

viewConversions.description: Number of desired actions completed based on views

conversionRate.description: Rate at which clicks resulted in conversions

viewConversionRate.description: Conversion rate based on actions that were viewed

totalCpa.description: Total cost per action across all actions

totalSumValue.description: Total value generated by all actions across all actions

sumValue.description: Total value generated by all actions

viewSumValue.description: Total value generated by all actions viewed

totalAverageValue.description: Total average value across all actions

viewAverageValue.description: Average value generated per action viewed

totalRoas.description: Total return on ad spend across all actions

marketer_id.description: ID of the marketer associated with the performance report
